API_Description: Indicates whether the display is in full-screen mode.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'isFullScreen' suggests a boolean property that checks or sets the full-screen state of the display.
Returns: A boolean value indicating the full-screen state.
Returns_Reason: The parameter type is boolean, which implies that the property returns a boolean value representing whether the display is in full-screen mode.

type.description: A boolean value to set or check the full-screen state.
type.description_reason: The parameter is named 'type' and is of boolean type, suggesting it is used to set or check the full-screen state.
type.type_reason: The parameter type is explicitly stated as boolean, indicating it is used to represent true or false states.
